title: (x) World of Warcraft font - Folkard {Mike F}
content:
Does anyone recognize the font upon which this sample button is based on? Its used on [www.worldofwarcraft.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081104035407/http:/www.worldofwarcraft.com/ "www.worldofwarcraft.com")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081104035407/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4.jpg) | 4.67 KB |

 [‹ (x) Reserve Solutions - Monotype Garamond {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081104035407/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14009 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pixies ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081104035407/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14033 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gerolds

comments.content:
Warcraft font can be downloaded [**here**](http://web.archive.org/web/20081104035407/http:/www.guildportal.com/Guild.aspx?GuildID=23262&TabID=210491) on the right side column.

———————————————————  
Yes, I’m old, but I’m back in style!
The font in the attached image is not Fritz Quadrata but another font, not used ingame but only for website artwork. The downloadlink on the site you linked is broken btw.
